trans-unit.source: Microsoft Edge works with Group Policy and Microsoft Intune to help you manage your organization's computer settings.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Edge works with Group Policy and Microsoft Intune to help you manage your organization's computer settings.

trans-unit.source: Group Policy objects (GPO's) can include registry-based Administrative Template policy settings, security settings, software deployment information, scripts, folder redirection, and preferences.
trans-unit.target: Group Policy objects (GPO's) can include registry-based Administrative Template policy settings, security settings, software deployment information, scripts, folder redirection, and preferences.

trans-unit.source: By using Group Policy and Intune, you can set up a policy setting once, and then copy that setting onto many computers.
trans-unit.target: By using Group Policy and Intune, you can set up a policy setting once, and then copy that setting onto many computers.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set up multiple security settings in a GPO that's linked to a domain, and then apply all of those settings to every computer in the domain.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can set up multiple security settings in a GPO that's linked to a domain, and then apply all of those settings to every computer in the domain.

trans-unit.source: For more info about Group Policy, see the [Group Policy TechCenter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=214514).
trans-unit.target: For more info about Group Policy, see the [Group Policy TechCenter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=214514).

trans-unit.source: This site provides links to the latest technical documentation, videos, and downloads for Group Policy.
trans-unit.target: This site provides links to the latest technical documentation, videos, and downloads for Group Policy.

trans-unit.source: For more info about the tools you can use to change your Group Policy objects, see the Internet Explorer 11 topics, [Group Policy and the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617921), [Group Policy and the Local Group Policy Editor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617922), [Group Policy and the Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617923), and [Group Policy and Windows Powershell](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617924).
trans-unit.target: For more info about the tools you can use to change your Group Policy objects, see the Internet Explorer 11 topics, [Group Policy and the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617921), [Group Policy and the Local Group Policy Editor](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617922), [Group Policy and the Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617923), and [Group Policy and Windows Powershell](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=617924).

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Edge works with these Group Policy settings \(`Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Microsoft Edge\`\) to help you manage your company's web browser configurations:
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Edge works with these Group Policy settings \(`Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Microsoft Edge\`\) to help you manage your company's web browser configurations:

trans-unit.source: Allow employees to send Do Not Track headers
trans-unit.target: Allow employees to send Do Not Track headers

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can send Do Not Track headers to websites that request tracking info.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can send Do Not Track headers to websites that request tracking info.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Employees can send Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Employees can send Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Stops employees from sending Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Stops employees from sending Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.

trans-unit.source: Turn off web content in new tab page
trans-unit.target: Turn off web content in new tab page

trans-unit.source: Decide what Microsoft Edge shows when opening a new tab.
trans-unit.target: Decide what Microsoft Edge shows when opening a new tab.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can see the new tab page with Top Sites, Top Sites with suggested content, or a blank page.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can see the new tab page with Top Sites, Top Sites with suggested content, or a blank page.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Employees see an empty tab and are unable to change the **Open new tabs with** setting.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Employees see an empty tab and are unable to change the **Open new tabs with** setting.

trans-unit.source: Decide how your company deals with cookies.
trans-unit.target: Decide how your company deals with cookies.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Lets you decide how your company treats cookies.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Lets you decide how your company treats cookies.

trans-unit.source: If you use this option, you must also choose whether to **Allow all cookies (default)**, **Block all cookies**, or **Block only 3rd-party cookies.**
trans-unit.target: If you use this option, you must also choose whether to **Allow all cookies (default)**, **Block all cookies**, or **Block only 3rd-party cookies.**

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Allows all cookies from all websites.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Allows all cookies from all websites.

trans-unit.source: Choose which corporate Home pages should appear for domain-joined devices.
trans-unit.target: Choose which corporate Home pages should appear for domain-joined devices.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Configure corporate Home pages for domain-joined devices.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Configure corporate Home pages for domain-joined devices.

trans-unit.source: If you use this option, you must also include site URLs.
trans-unit.target: If you use this option, you must also include site URLs.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** You must use this format and the angle brackets if you have multiple pages.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** You must use this format and the angle brackets if you have multiple pages.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Uses the corporate Home pages and URLs specified in the App settings.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Uses the corporate Home pages and URLs specified in the App settings.

trans-unit.source: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List
trans-unit.target: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List

trans-unit.source: Whether your company uses Enterprise Mode and the Enterprise Mode Site List to address common compatibility problems with legacy apps.
trans-unit.target: Whether your company uses Enterprise Mode and the Enterprise Mode Site List to address common compatibility problems with legacy apps.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Lets you use the Enterprise Mode Site List to address common compatibility problems with legacy apps, if it’s configured.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Lets you use the Enterprise Mode Site List to address common compatibility problems with legacy apps, if it’s configured.

trans-unit.source: If you use this option, you must also add the location to your site list in the **{URI}** box.
trans-unit.target: If you use this option, you must also add the location to your site list in the **{URI}** box.

trans-unit.source: When configured, any site on the list will always open in IE11.
trans-unit.target: When configured, any site on the list will always open in IE11.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured:** You won't be able to use the Enterprise Mode Site List.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured:** You won't be able to use the Enterprise Mode Site List.

trans-unit.source: Decide what sites appear on the default **Favorites** list.
trans-unit.target: Decide what sites appear on the default **Favorites** list.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Configure the default list of **Favorite** sites for your employees.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Configure the default list of **Favorite** sites for your employees.

trans-unit.source: If you use this option, you must also add the actual names and URLs for the sites.
trans-unit.target: If you use this option, you must also add the actual names and URLs for the sites.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Uses the **Favorites** list names and URLs specified in the **Favorites** hub.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Uses the **Favorites** list names and URLs specified in the **Favorites** hub.

trans-unit.source: Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides
trans-unit.target: Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can override the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially malicious websites.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can override the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially malicious websites.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Stops employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings and blocks them from visiting the site.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Stops employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings and blocks them from visiting the site.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Lets employees ignore the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially malicious sites and continue to the site.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Lets employees ignore the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially malicious sites and continue to the site.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** You can also turn on the SmartScreen Filter, using the **Turn off the SmartScreen Filter** setting and stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about unverified file downloads, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides for unverified files** setting.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** You can also turn on the SmartScreen Filter, using the **Turn off the SmartScreen Filter** setting and stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about unverified file downloads, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides for unverified files** setting.

trans-unit.source: Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides for unverified files
trans-unit.target: Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides for unverified files

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can override the SmartScreen Filter warnings about downloading unverified files.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can override the SmartScreen Filter warnings about downloading unverified files.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Stops employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings and stops them from downloading unverified files.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Stops employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings and stops them from downloading unverified files.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Lets employees ignore the SmartScreen Filter warnings about unverified files and lets them continue the download process.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Lets employees ignore the SmartScreen Filter warnings about unverified files and lets them continue the download process.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** You can also turn on the SmartScreen Filter, using the **Turn off the SmartScreen Filter** setting and stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially dangerous websites, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides** setting.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** You can also turn on the SmartScreen Filter, using the **Turn off the SmartScreen Filter** setting and stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially dangerous websites, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides** setting.

trans-unit.source: Don't allow WebRTC to share the LocalHost IP address
trans-unit.target: Don't allow WebRTC to share the LocalHost IP address

trans-unit.source: Whether an employee’s LocalHost IP address shows while using the WebRTC protocol
trans-unit.target: Whether an employee’s LocalHost IP address shows while using the WebRTC protocol

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Hides the LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Hides the LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Shows the LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Shows the LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.

trans-unit.source: Send all intranet sites to IE11
trans-unit.target: Send all intranet sites to IE11

trans-unit.source: Whether your intranet sites should all open using IE11.
trans-unit.target: Whether your intranet sites should all open using IE11.

trans-unit.source: **Important:** This setting should only be used if there are known compatibility problems with Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **Important:** This setting should only be used if there are known compatibility problems with Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Automatically opens all intranet sites using IE11.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Automatically opens all intranet sites using IE11.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Automatically opens all intranet sites using Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Automatically opens all intranet sites using Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: Whether search suggestions should appear in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: Whether search suggestions should appear in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Employees can’t see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Employees can’t see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can use Autofill to automatically fill in form fields while using Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can use Autofill to automatically fill in form fields while using Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can use Autofill to complete form fields.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can use Autofill to complete form fields.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Employees can’t use Autofill to complete form fields.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Employees can’t use Autofill to complete form fields.

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can browse using InPrivate website browsing.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can browse using InPrivate website browsing.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Shows the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Shows the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Hides the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Hides the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: Whether the F12 Developer Tools are available on Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: Whether the F12 Developer Tools are available on Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Lets employees use InPrivate browsing while on the corporate network.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Lets employees use InPrivate browsing while on the corporate network.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Stops employees from using inPrivate browsing on the corporate network.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Stops employees from using inPrivate browsing on the corporate network.

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can save their passwords locally, using Password Manager.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can save their passwords locally, using Password Manager.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can use Password Manager to save passwords locally.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Employees can use Password Manager to save passwords locally.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Employees can't use Password Manager to save passwords locally.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Employees can't use Password Manager to save passwords locally.

trans-unit.source: Whether to turn on Pop-up Blocker and allow pop-ups to appear in secondary windows.
trans-unit.target: Whether to turn on Pop-up Blocker and allow pop-ups to appear in secondary windows.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Turns on Pop-up Blocker, stopping pop-up windows.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Turns on Pop-up Blocker, stopping pop-up windows.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Turns off Pop-up Blocker, allowing pop-up windows.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Turns off Pop-up Blocker, allowing pop-up windows.

trans-unit.source: Whether to turn on SmartScreen Filter to help protect your employees from potential phishing scams and malicious software.
trans-unit.target: Whether to turn on SmartScreen Filter to help protect your employees from potential phishing scams and malicious software.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured (default):** Turns on SmartScreen Filter, providing warning messages to your employees about potential phishing scams and malicious software.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured (default):** Turns on SmartScreen Filter, providing warning messages to your employees about potential phishing scams and malicious software.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** You can also stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially dangerous websites, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides** setting and stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about unverified file downloads, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides for unverified files** setting.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** You can also stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about potentially dangerous websites, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides** setting and stop employees from ignoring the SmartScreen Filter warnings about unverified file downloads, using the **Don’t allow SmartScreen Filter warning overrides for unverified files** setting.

trans-unit.source: Using Microsoft Intune to manage your Mobile Data Management (MDM) settings for Microsoft Edge
trans-unit.target: Using Microsoft Intune to manage your Mobile Data Management (MDM) settings for Microsoft Edge

trans-unit.source: If you manage your policies using Intune, you'll want to use these MDM policy settings:
trans-unit.target: If you manage your policies using Intune, you'll want to use these MDM policy settings:

trans-unit.source: Supports Windows 10 Pro and Windows 10 Enterprise computers that are enrolled with Intune only.
trans-unit.target: Supports Windows 10 Pro and Windows 10 Enterprise computers that are enrolled with Intune only.

trans-unit.source: Supports both desktop and mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Supports both desktop and mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: All devices must be enrolled with Intune if you want to use the Windows Custom URI Policy.
trans-unit.target: All devices must be enrolled with Intune if you want to use the Windows Custom URI Policy.

trans-unit.source: **0.** Employees can’t use Autofill to complete form fields.
trans-unit.target: **0.** Employees can’t use Autofill to complete form fields.

trans-unit.source: Employees can use Autofill to complete form fields.
trans-unit.target: Employees can use Autofill to complete form fields.

trans-unit.source: **0.** Employees can't use the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **0.** Employees can't use the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: Employees can use the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: Employees can use the F12 Developer Tools on Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: Stops employees from sending Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.
trans-unit.target: Stops employees from sending Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Employees can send Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Employees can send Do Not Track headers to websites requesting tracking info.

trans-unit.source: **0.** Employees can use InPrivate browsing sessions.
trans-unit.target: **0.** Employees can use InPrivate browsing sessions.

trans-unit.source: Employees can't use InPrivate Browsing sessions.
trans-unit.target: Employees can't use InPrivate Browsing sessions.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Edge doesn't use IE Zone configuration for intranet sites.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Edge doesn't use IE Zone configuration for intranet sites.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Microsoft Edge uses IE Zone configuration for intranet sites.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Microsoft Edge uses IE Zone configuration for intranet sites.

trans-unit.source: Employees can use Password Manager to save passwords locally.
trans-unit.target: Employees can use Password Manager to save passwords locally.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Employees can't use Password Manager to save passwords locally.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Employees can't use Password Manager to save passwords locally.

trans-unit.source: Turns off Pop-up Blocker, stopping pop-up windows
trans-unit.target: Turns off Pop-up Blocker, stopping pop-up windows

trans-unit.source: **1.** Turns on Pop-up Blocker, allowing pop-up windows.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Turns on Pop-up Blocker, allowing pop-up windows.

trans-unit.source: Employees can see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: Employees can see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Employees can’t see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Employees can’t see search suggestions in the **Address** bar of Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: Turns on SmartScreen Filter, providing warning messages to your employees about potential phishing scams and malicious software.
trans-unit.target: Turns on SmartScreen Filter, providing warning messages to your employees about potential phishing scams and malicious software.

trans-unit.source: Open a new tab with a new tab page.
trans-unit.target: Open a new tab with a new tab page.

trans-unit.source: Allow all cookies from all sites.
trans-unit.target: Allow all cookies from all sites.

trans-unit.source: **2.** Block all cookies from all sites.
trans-unit.target: **2.** Block all cookies from all sites.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Use Enterprise Mode site list, if configured.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Use Enterprise Mode site list, if configured.

trans-unit.source: **2.** Specify the location to the site list.
trans-unit.target: **2.** Specify the location to the site list.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** URLs must be on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** URLs must be on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: Employees can ignore SmartScreen warnings for files.
trans-unit.target: Employees can ignore SmartScreen warnings for files.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Employees can't override SmartScreen warnings for files.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Employees can't override SmartScreen warnings for files.

trans-unit.source: Shows an employee's LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.
trans-unit.target: Shows an employee's LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.

trans-unit.source: **1.** Hides an employee's LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.
trans-unit.target: **1.** Hides an employee's LocalHost IP address while using the WebRTC protocol.

trans-unit.source: These are additional Windows 10-specific Group Policy settings that work with Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: These are additional Windows 10-specific Group Policy settings that work with Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Enable or not configured:** Employees can use Cortana on their devices.
trans-unit.target: **Enable or not configured:** Employees can use Cortana on their devices.

trans-unit.source: **Disable:** Stops employees from using Cortana on their devices.
trans-unit.target: **Disable:** Stops employees from using Cortana on their devices.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Employees can still perform searches even with Cortana turned off.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** Employees can still perform searches even with Cortana turned off.

trans-unit.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\sync your settings\Do not sync
trans-unit.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\sync your settings\Do not sync

trans-unit.source: Whether employees can use the **Sync your Settings** options to sync their settings to and from their device.
trans-unit.target: Whether employees can use the **Sync your Settings** options to sync their settings to and from their device.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Turns off the **Sync your Settings** options and none of the **Sync your Setting** groups are synced on the device.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Turns off the **Sync your Settings** options and none of the **Sync your Setting** groups are synced on the device.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Allow users to turn syncing on** option to turn the feature off by default, but to let the employee change this setting.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Allow users to turn syncing on** option to turn the feature off by default, but to let the employee change this setting.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Turns on the **Sync your Settings** area by default, letting employees pick what can sync on their device.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Turns on the **Sync your Settings** area by default, letting employees pick what can sync on their device.

trans-unit.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\sync your settings\Do not sync browser settings
trans-unit.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\sync your settings\Do not sync browser settings

trans-unit.source: Whether a browser group can use the **Sync your Settings** options to sync their info to and from their device.
trans-unit.target: Whether a browser group can use the **Sync your Settings** options to sync their info to and from their device.

trans-unit.source: This includes settings and info like **History** and **Favorites**.
trans-unit.target: This includes settings and info like **History** and **Favorites**.

trans-unit.source: **Enable:** Turns off the **Sync your Settings** options so that browser groups are unable to sync their settings and info.
trans-unit.target: **Enable:** Turns off the **Sync your Settings** options so that browser groups are unable to sync their settings and info.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Allow users to turn browser syncing on** option to turn the feature off by default, but to let the employee change this setting.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Allow users to turn browser syncing on** option to turn the feature off by default, but to let the employee change this setting.

trans-unit.source: **Disable or not configured (default):** Turns on the **Sync your Settings** area by default, letting browser groups pick what can sync on their device.
trans-unit.target: **Disable or not configured (default):** Turns on the **Sync your Settings** area by default, letting browser groups pick what can sync on their device.

trans-unit.source: These are additional Windows 10-specific MDM policy settings that work with Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: These are additional Windows 10-specific MDM policy settings that work with Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **0.** Employees can’t use Cortana on their devices.
trans-unit.target: **0.** Employees can’t use Cortana on their devices.

trans-unit.source: Employees can use Cortana on their devices.
trans-unit.target: Employees can use Cortana on their devices.

trans-unit.source: **0.** Employees can’t sync settings between PCs.
trans-unit.target: **0.** Employees can’t sync settings between PCs.
